howItWorks.title: How to rent out your property on Renterya
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process where you stay in control at every step — from listing to contract and recurring payments.

1.title: Create an owner profile
1.desc: Fill in basic information — it takes only a few minutes.

2.title: Add your property
2.desc: Upload photos, describe the property, and set house rules.

3.title: Set rental conditions
3.desc: Specify price, rental term, deposit, or rent without a deposit using protection.

4.title: Receive requests and chat
4.desc: All communication happens directly on the platform — without intermediaries or “call me later.”

5.title: Review the renter profile and choose the best option
5.desc: Budget, rental term, employment, children, pets, smoking — key parameters are visible immediately.

6.title: Sign the contract online
6.desc: Fix all agreements quickly — without paperwork, scans, or extra meetings.

7.title: Connect your card to receive payments
7.desc: Link your card on the payments page to receive funds directly.

8.title: Receive online subscription payments
8.desc: Recurring payments — stable, transparent, and convenient for both parties.

howItWorks.footerSuffix: provides the tools to make renting modern, secure, and predictable.

benefits.title: Why owners choose Renterya
benefits.subtitle: We’ve combined the key tools of modern renting into one platform — so you can feel calm, confident, and in control.

1.title: No intermediaries
1.desc: You rent directly — without agents, extra commissions, or outside pressure. Full control stays with you.

2.title: Direct chat with renter
2.desc: Communicate and record agreements in one place — no lost messages or delays.

3.title: Property protection up to ₴250,000
3.desc: Renting without a deposit can be safe. Insurance protection helps reduce risks and attract more renters.

4.title: Renter profile with key parameters
4.desc: You see essential information before deciding: rental term, employment, budget, children, pets, smoking — all transparent.

5.title: Online contract in minutes
5.desc: Create and sign contracts online — without paperwork, scans, or unnecessary bureaucracy.

6.title: Subscription-based online payments
6.desc: Recurring payments without reminders or delays. Easier for you to manage rent, easier for renters to pay.

7.title: Owners community
7.desc: Experience sharing, advice, and a live platform environment. Get support from other owners and find renters faster.

8.title: Transparent 2.5% fee on online payments
8.desc: No hidden fees. Renters pay no commission — you pay only for service and results when using online payments.

benefits.footerPrefix: Renterya is built for owners who want to rent out property in a modern way: fast, direct, and fully in control.

protection.title: Property protection instead of a deposit
protection.subtitle: Rent out your property without a deposit — without risking your real estate.
protection.body: Renterya offers a modern approach to renting: instead of a mandatory deposit — property insurance protection up to ₴250,000.
protection.body2: The renter pays a monthly insurance contribution together with rent, allowing the owner to maintain financial security without requiring a deposit.

bullets.1: ability to rent without a deposit
bullets.3: monthly insurance contribution from the renter
bullets.5: peace of mind and owner confidence

items.1: damage to furniture and household appliances
items.2: damage to interior and renovation elements
items.3: damage caused by water, fire, and other household incidents

protection.amountLabel: Maximum insurance coverage amount (according to platform terms).
protection.note: Property protection is an additional level of security and is applied in accordance with platform conditions. All details are available during rental and contract setup.

renterProfile.title: You know who you rent to
renterProfile.subtitle: The renter profile shows key parameters before you decide — so you can choose confidently and with fewer risks.
renterProfile.body: Renterya helps owners make balanced decisions. Before confirming the rental, you see essential information that affects living comfort and compliance with your rules.
renterProfile.whyText: This reduces random applications, saves your time, and helps you find a renter who truly fits your expectations.
renterProfile.closingSuffix: means comfortable renting for both sides.

community.title: Renterya owners community
community.subtitle: A space where owners share experience, get support, and find renters faster.
community.body: Renterya is more than listings. It’s an environment where you can ask questions, receive answers from other owners, share experience and advice, and publish your property in the community to attract renter attention.

1.title: Experience sharing
1.desc: Real advice from owners: how to prepare property, which rules work, and how to avoid common mistakes.

2.title: Support and mutual help
2.desc: Ask, share, and receive recommendations — in a convenient format directly on the platform.

3.title: Faster renter search
3.desc: Community publishing helps increase reach and receive applications faster.

docsPayments.title: Everything for renting — in one place
docsPayments.subtitle: From agreements to payments — without paperwork, scans, or third-party services.

contract.title: Online contract
contract.body: Create and sign contracts directly on the platform. Terms are fixed transparently — without confusion or verbal agreements.

payments.title: Subscription payments
payments.body: The renter pays rent online on the platform — regularly and on time. The owner receives predictable payments without reminders or unnecessary messages.

pricing.title: Transparent fee with no hidden charges
pricing.subtitle: Renterya is a completely free platform. We do not charge for registration, property listings, or platform usage.

main.note: The platform’s only fee applies solely to online payments — charged to the owner.
main.extra: If rent is not paid online — no commission applies.

renter.title: For renter
renter.note: the renter pays only rent and a monthly insurance contribution (if protection is chosen)

free.title: Free
free.note: no subscriptions, plans, or hidden fees
